values.value: Select Id, Work_Order__c, Name, Account_Code__c, Line_of_Business_Code__c, Order_Date__c, Due_Date__c, Delivery_Instructions__c, Pronto_PO_Number__c, Warehouse_Code__c, Currency__c, Currency_Rate__c, User__c, SC_Project_Code__c, Company__c, Delivery_Address_Name__c, Postal_Street__c, Postal_City__c, Postal_State__c, Postal_Country__c, Postal_Postcode__c, LastModifiedDate, CreatedDate, TECH_Work_Order_Territory_Branch_Code__c, Type__c, Notes__c From Purchase_Order__c Where (Status__c = 'Approved' OR Status__c = 'Cancelled') AND Integration_Status__c != 'Successful' AND Integration_Status__c != 'Waiting Confirmation'
